name: okidogi

abilities.name: toxic-chain
abilities.description: The power of the Pokémon's toxic chain may badly poison any target the Pokémon hits with a move

abilities.name: guard-dog
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.

description: After all its muscles were stimulated by the toxic chain around its neck, Okidogi transformed and gained a powerful physique.
